channel.title: [Delta] How I can something for the object stay on the height 0

item.title: [Delta] How I can something for the object stay on the height 0
item.dc:creator: @oniscape oniscape
item.description:
@oniscape wrote:

Make it so it deletes the object on all other floors, or replaces it.

//THIS DOES NOT WORK, IT IS A CONCEPT.
public void makeGlobalObject(parameters) {
if(heightLevel == height) {
} else {
deleteObject();
}
}

Theres my advice, enjoy.

item.title: [Delta] How I can something for the object stay on the height 0
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

Hi I want to keep the object I add to the height 0 cuz if I go height 1 he came up too

Like something like

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int height, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

example: makeGlobalObject(2222, 2222, 0, 2213, 0, 10);

any help will be apreciated
